response.answer_text: I'll assume You're talking about Pride Month in this answer. It's celebrated in the Entire month of June. This is in remembrance of the Stonewall Riots in 1969. Arguably, the most powerful stand for gay rights in history. A true victory for the Gay Liberation Movement. This celebration is in almost every Country, State, and City in the World. It's a time to openly be LGBTQ. Many suffered Their entire lives as forcefully closeted gays, never having been accepted by Society. This is a chance for others to come out and join the celebration. Anyone can simply browse the words “ Gay Pride Parade” and I'm sure You'll find one within 100 miles of Your Town/City. I encourage Anyone that may still be closeted to get out this Month and be Proud of Who You are in Your own community. There's still change yo be made. The Bi  ggest Pride Parties, Parades, and Celebrations in 2019 | The Manual

LGBTQ is the great support system around the world for sexual minoraty groups. L - lesbian women her are only attracted to other women(same sex), g- gay men only attracted to other men(same sex), b bi-sexual men or women attracted to both genders, t trans a man or a women wanting a sex change because they feel more masculine or feminine or they are born like that, q questioning/quer not sure about there sexual preference yet and need some support. I hope this helps answer your question.
